title: snowflake.snowpark.functions.create_map | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
Transforms multiple column pairs into a single map Column where each pair of
columns is treated as a key-value pair in the resulting map.

*cols – A variable number of column names or Column objects that can also be
expressed as a list of columns.
The function expects an even number of arguments, where each pair of arguments represents a key-value
pair for the map.
A Column where each row contains a map created from the provided column pairs.
